mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qr_code_config (qrcode_id, share_code, scan_start_time, scan_end_time, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{qrcodeId}, #{shareCode}, #{scanStartTime}, #{scanEndTime}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, qrcode_id as qrcodeId, share_code as shareCode, scan_start_time as scanStartTime, scan_end_time as scanEndTime, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM qr_code_config WHERE qrcode_id = #{qrcodeId}
